Articles.Content:
Hi !

I uploaded on youtube my video how soundtrack from KSP helps my child as a lullaby . The real thing is that She likes Kerbal music much more than the original Fisher Price lullaby melodies....

Have fun fellows!

Clever. Now, you will almost always have peace and quiet when you play.

I skipped to the end to see if she would fall asleep. Did she eventually?
This time nope, because I need to record this movie in full daylight for nice quality, but when night comes it could happen.
